lead_paragraph: JACOBSON--Seymour B.,M.D., 97, died peacefully February 19, 2016. Geriatric psychiatrist and member of The New York Academy of Medicine, served at many institutions, including The Jewish Home and Hospital for the Aged, New York Medical College, the New York County Medical Society. Survived by daughter Ann Lauinger (Joseph Lauinger), grandson Jacob Lauinger (Marisa O'Connor), and great-grandson Samuel Lauinger. Interment private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JACOBSON, SEYMOUR B.
